# Cleaning data

```{r}
clean_data <- function(dataframe) {
  # create dataframe
  data_clean <- dataframe |>
    # filter out the first 25 rows 
    filter(row_number() > 25) |> 
    # separate the header columns into different headers
    separate(col = `<Header>`, 
             into = c("code_class", "name", "accesion_number", "count"), 
             sep= ",") |> 
    drop_na()
    

  return(data_clean)
  }
```
